The software, in source, binary, or other forms, is provided to you under the Base License subject to the following clauses:

A) The grant of rights under the Base License will not include, and this license does not grant to you, the right to publish or distribute derivative works of this software, or otherwise make them publicly available.

B) Clause A shall not apply to derivative works which are included into the source form of this software, and shall not apply to those which have existed for no greater than six weeks since their first public availability.

C) Clause A terminates on the Change Date, or the sixth anniversary of the first publicly available distribution of the software, whichever is earlier. Thereafter, you are granted full rights set forth in the Base License.

D) This license and the copyright notice above shall be included in each original or modified copy of the source form of the software.

For the purpose of clauses above only, and notwithstanding the Base License, the definition of "derivative works" shall not include works that link or bind by name to the interface of the software and are not otherwise based upon the software.

Everyone is permitted to copy and distribute verbatim copies of this license, but modification is not permitted.
